functions.name: fintech_transaction_encryption_authentication_and_external_systems_security
functions.description: Checks if transaction encryption, authentication, and external systems security are enforced in Fintech.

notes: All functions are based on Azure Fintech API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.

Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
